1:
Blessed is the man who does not walk in the advice of the wicked,\q or stand in the pathway with sinners,
\q or sit in the assembly of mockers.
\q
2:
But his delight is in the law of Yahweh,\q and on his law he meditates day and night.


\q
3:
He will be like a tree planted by the streams of water\q that produces its fruit in its season,
\q whose leaves do not wither;
\q whatever he does will prosper.


\q
4:
The wicked are not so,\q but are instead like the chaff that the wind drives away.
\q
5:
So the wicked will not stand in the judgment,\q nor sinners in the assembly of the righteous.


\q
6: For Yahweh approves of the way of the righteous,\q but the way of the wicked will perish.
